scripts.deploy-lambda: rm -rf lambdas/deploy/hero-sheet-storage && mkdir -p lambdas/deploy/hero-sheet-storage && cp lambdas/src/hero-sheet-storage.js lambdas/deploy/hero-sheet-storage/index.js && mkdir -p lambdas/deploy/hero-sheet-storage/schema && cp src/schema/charsheet.schema.json lambdas/deploy/hero-sheet-storage/schema/charsheet.schema.json &&  cp src/schema/common.schema.json lambdas/deploy/hero-sheet-storage/schema/common.schema.json && cd lambdas/deploy/hero-sheet-storage && 7z a hero-sheet-storage.zip -r * && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name hero-sheet-storage --zip-file fileb://hero-sheet-storage.zip --publish
